explanation: [0-0] A silver tabby cat lies lazily on a pink fluffy carpet. The floor is gray wooden planks, with yellow wooden planks on the left side.

[0-3] A person takes out a wooden frame for assembling a small bed and places it in front of the kitten. Then they take out a black electric drill and start assembling. The scene switches to a woman in pink pajamas assembling the bed. The kitten is now sitting on the bed, which is black with a pink quilt and a pink pillow. Next to the bed is a red toolbox and some tools. The woman then installs the assembled small bed on the side of the bed. The kitten meows at the camera.
